name: Doctor Doctor
description:
Doctor Doctor is a combination of potion making (Borin) and keeping your Idle Hero (Frederick) alive and strong enough to fend off hordes of rats.

Killing rats gives resources for potions, and making potions gives you money to upgrade your idle hero.

___

Programmers:
Andrew Dowsett
Jacob Pipers
Lewis Hill
